lines.content: * Represents the chatbot that keeps track of user's tasks.
* @param filePath The location to store the save file.
* Executes the main functionalities of the chatbot.
* Represents the command to add a deadline task to the to-do list.
/** Prefix used to invoke the add deadline command **/
* @param arguments Arguments passed to the command.
public void execute(TodoList list, Ui ui, FileStore store) throws TohruException {
// Check if no arguments are provided
throw new TohruException("Missing argument: Please specify description and deadline");
// Check if all arguments are present
throw new TohruException("Missing argument: Missing either description or deadline");
throw new TohruException("Missing argument: Please specify description");
throw new TohruException("Missing argument: Please specify deadline");
ui.showText(String.format("There are now %d total entries", list.getTotal()));

* Represents the command to exit the chatbot.
/** Prefix used to invoke the bye command **/
* @param arguments Arguments passed to the command.
public void execute(TodoList list, Ui ui, FileStore store) {
ui.showText("Bye. Hope to see you again soon!");
* Represents a specific operation that interacts with the to-do list, store and ui.
/** Formatter used to parse datetime strings in arguments **/
protected static final DateTimeFormatter DATE_TIME_FORMATTER = DateTimeFormatter.ofPattern("d/M/y HHmm");
/** The argument passed in to a command **/
* Represents a command object that takes in its argument.
* @param arguments The argument to be passed in for a command.
* @param list The to-do list to modify.
* @param store The storage medium to interact.
* @throws TohruException When invalid arguments are encountered.
public abstract void execute(TodoList list, Ui ui, FileStore store) throws TohruException;
* Checks if the application should exit after the execution of this command.
* @return A boolean representing if the application should exit.
* Represents the command to delete an entry in the to-do list.
/** Prefix used to invoke the delete command **/
* @param arguments Arguments passed to the command.
public void execute(TodoList list, Ui ui, FileStore store) throws TohruException {
// Check if no arguments are provided
throw new TohruException("Missing argument: Specify index to delete");
throw new TohruException(String.format("%s is not valid index", arguments));
ui.showText("Alright! I have removed this task from list:");
